statements: DELETE FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_id = 100 AND subscription_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE customer_segment = 'High Value';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND last_name = 'Smith';
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' OR end_date > '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM campaign_targets WHERE status = 'active' AND customer_id = 5;
DELETE FROM campaign_history WHERE customer_id = 100 AND action = 'clicked';
DELETE FROM campaign_history WHERE action = 'clicked' AND action_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM campaign_customers WHERE campaign_id = 1 AND customer_id = 2;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age < 30 AND first_name = 'John';
